text: when i was a little girl my father
always told me that an indian woman
when she's young she's dependent on her
father
when she's married she's dependent on
her husband and when she's a child
when she's old she's dependent on her
son and i don't want you to be like that
i want you to have independence i want
you to be the master of your destiny
and i and the only way you can do that
is if you are educated and you can stand
on your
own two feet i was really lucky
to have parents like this who gave me
opportunities
of a great uh education
who let me do what i wanted so today
when i'm
standing on my own two feet i decided
that i was going to work towards
women's empowerment in india
